column4: can someone tell me how to uninstall libdvdcss2? i tried: sudo dpkg -r libdvdcss2_1.2.8-1unofficialubuntu3_i386.deb but that gave: dpkg: you must specify packages by their own names, not by quoting the names of the files they come in. c
good question. the file name is libdvdcss2_1.2.8-1unofficialubuntu3_i386.deb i found it on the forum...
